name: Boa Marigold
text: On Play: If you have two or more characters in play with the (Amazon Lily) or (Kuja Pirates) type, place up to one cost 2 or less character on the bottom of its owner's deck.

effect.text: If you have two or more characters in play with the (Amazon Lily) or (Kuja Pirates) type, place up to one cost 2 or less character on the bottom of its owner's deck.
conditions: two or more characters in play with the (Amazon Lily) or (Kuja Pirates) type
